paper_abstract: By applying discharging methods and properties of critical graphs, we proved that every simple planar graph G is of class 1 if Delta(G) = 6 and any k-cycle is adjacent to at most one k-cycle for some k (k = 3, 4, 5). (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Edge coloring of planar graphs which any two short cycles are adjacent at most once
